channel.title: Image Compression on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Image Compression on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: COSMIC: Compress Satellite Image Efficiently via Diffusion Compensation
item.description: COSMIC efficiently compresses satellite images via a lightweight encoder and diffusion compensation, enabling practical onboard processing and high compression ratios.

item.title: Learning Optimal Lattice Vector Quantizers for End-to-end Neural Image Compression
item.description: Learned optimal lattice vector quantization (OLVQ) drastically boosts neural image compression efficiency by adapting quantizer structures to latent feature distributions, achieving significant rate-d…
